name: Ham and Broccoli Quiche with Swiss Cheese
author: myvallie
summary: Quick, easy, and light. This ham and broccoli quiche basic recipe can be altered by substituting your favorite meats, vegetables, and cheeses. Give it a try!
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) refrigerated pie crust (such as Pillsbury®)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Remove pie crust from the refrigerator and allow it to come to room temperature, about 15 minutes
Unroll the unbaked crust and press it firmly without stretching into the bottom and sides of a glass pie plate
Prick the crust all over with a fork
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 11 to 13 minutes
Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place broccoli in a microwave-safe bowl and cook in the microwave to desired tenderness, 3 to 5 minutes
Layer ham, Swiss cheese, and broccoli in the crust-lined plate
Combine eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt, and black pepper in a bowl; pour over broccoli
Bake in the hot oven until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, 35 to 45 minutes
